Package pacman_ultimater.project_base.gui_swing.ui.controller

Class MenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman_ultimater.project_base.gui_swing.ui.controller.MenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IKeyDownHandler
    public class MenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IKeyDownHandler
    Controlls menu state of the game. If game play is initiated, instantiates and passes controll to gamePlayController.
